name: Topcom Europe
overview: Topcom Europe NV develops, manufactures, and sells communication and lifecare products for residential and small office home office markets. The companyâ€™s products include cordless and corded telephones, walkie-talkies, Internet telephones, voice over IP adapters and solutions, modems, wireless and wired networking, broadband and wireless LAN products, and accessories, as well as accessories for Internet communications. Its products also include handheld massage appliances, massage cushions, neck and spot massage appliances, and foot and leg massage appliances; wrist and arm blood pressure monitors, ear thermometers, nutrition scales, and body weight scales; sport watches, bicycle computers, chronographs, emergency led lights, and humidifiers; and fetal doppler monitors, babyphones, hygrometers, medical sets, baby bottle warmers, steamers, cookers, and toys. The company serves OEM customers. It sells its products through agents and distributors, electronics chains, discounters, retailers, computer shops, department stores, lifecare and baby care stores, and telecom specialists, as well as through electricians and operators in Europe, Asia, Australia, the Middle East, South Africa, and North and South America. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Heverlee, Belgium with sales offices in Kungsbacka, Sweden; Madrid, Spain; Warszawa, Poland; Senkvice, Slovak Republic; DÃ¼sseldorf, Germany; and Hong Kong, Hong Kong. It has a branch office in Shenzhen, the People’s Republic of China.
